name: HELMICOL 3035
description: Helmicol 3035 is a two-component, fast reacting, solvent-free, polyurethane adhesive formulated to permanently install luxury vinyl tile and plank flooring, resilient sheet vinyl flooring, rubber tile flooring and rubber sheet flooring and rubber and vinyl stair treads. Helmicol 3035 has been formulated to produce a superior, flexible bond required for use in high traffic applications. May be used over properly prepared porous and non-porous surfaces such as concrete, underlayment grade plywood, cementitious based patching compounds and levelers.
